name: NavigationLink
desc: A view that controls a navigation presentation.

items.name: init(LocalizedStringKey, destination: () -> Destination)
items.desc: Creates a navigation link that presents a destination view, with a text label that the link generates from a localized string key.

items.name: init<S>(S, destination: () -> Destination)
items.desc: Creates a navigation link that presents a destination view, with a text label that the link generates from a title string.

items.name: init(destination: () -> Destination, label: () -> Label)
items.desc: Creates a navigation link that presents the destination view.

items.name: init(destinationName: String, label: () -> Label)
items.desc: Creates a navigation link that presents a view from a WatchKit storyboard.

items.name: init(LocalizedStringKey, isActive: Binding<Bool>, destination: () -> Destination)
items.desc: Creates a navigation link that presents a destination view when active, with a text label that the link generates from a localized string key.

items.name: init<S>(S, isActive: Binding<Bool>, destination: () -> Destination)
items.desc: Creates a navigation link that presents a destination view when active, with a text label that the link generates from a title string.

items.name: init(isActive: Binding<Bool>, destination: () -> Destination, label: () -> Label)
items.desc: Creates a navigation link that presents the destination view when active.

items.name: init(destinationName: String, isActive: Binding<Bool>, label: () -> Label)
items.desc: Creates a navigation link that presents a view from a WatchKit storyboard when active.

items.name: init<V>(LocalizedStringKey, tag: V, selection: Binding<V?>, destination: () -> Destination)
items.desc: Creates a navigation link that presents a destination view when a bound selection variable matches a value you provide, using a text label that the link generates from a localized string key.

items.name: init<S, V>(S, tag: V, selection: Binding<V?>, destination: () -> Destination)
items.desc: Creates a navigation link that presents a destination view when a bound selection variable matches a value you provide, using a text label that the link generates from a title string.

items.name: init<V>(tag: V, selection: Binding<V?>, destination: () -> Destination, label: () -> Label)
items.desc: Creates a navigation link that presents the destination view when a bound selection variable equals a given tag value.

items.name: init<V>(destinationName: String, tag: V, selection: Binding<V?>, label: () -> Label)
items.desc: Creates a navigation link that presents a view from a WatchKit storyboard when a bound selection variable matches a value you provide.

items.name: func isDetailLink(Bool) -> some View
items.desc: Sets the navigation link to present its destination as the detail component of the containing navigation view.

items.name: var body: some View
items.desc: The content and behavior of the view.

items.name: typealias Body
items.desc: The type of view representing the body of this view.
